app.name: About Me
app.author: Shawnyxx
app.description: Learn more about me, my skills, projects, and download my resume.
app.htmlContent:
<!DOCTYPE html>
            <html lang="en">
            
            <head>
                <meta charset="UTF-8">
                <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
                <title>About Me - Portfolio</title>
                <style>
                    * {
                        margin: 0;
                        padding: 0;
                        box-sizing: border-box;
                    }

                    body {
                        font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, sans-serif;
                        background: #0a0a0a;
                        color: #e0e0e0;
                        height: 100vh;
                        overflow: hidden;
                    }

                    .container {
                        height: 100vh;
                        overflow-y: auto;
                        overflow-x: hidden;
                    }

                    .container::-webkit-scrollbar {
                        width: 10px;
                    }

                    .container::-webkit-scrollbar-track {
                        background: #0a0a0a;
                    }

                    .container::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb {
                        background: #333;
                        border-radius: 5px;
                    }

                    .container::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb:hover {
                        background: #444;
                    }

                    .hero-section {
                        position: relative;
                        background: linear-gradient(135deg, #1a1a1a 0%, #0a0a0a 100%);
                        padding: 80px 20px;
                        text-align: center;
                        border-bottom: 2px solid transparent;
                        background-clip: padding-box;
                        overflow: hidden;
                    }

                    .hero-section::before {
                        content: '';
                        position: absolute;
                        top: 0;
                        left: 0;
                        right: 0;
                        bottom: 0;
                        background: linear-gradient(90deg, 
                            transparent, 
                            rgba(100, 100, 255, 0.1) 25%, 
                            rgba(100, 200, 255, 0.1) 50%, 
                            rgba(100, 100, 255, 0.1) 75%, 
                            transparent
                        );
                        animation: shimmer 3s infinite;
                        pointer-events: none;
                    }

                    @keyframes shimmer {
                        0% { transform: translateX(-100%); }
                        100% { transform: translateX(100%); }
                    }

                    .hero-section::after {
                        content: '';
                        position: absolute;
                        bottom: -2px;
                        left: 0;
                        right: 0;
                        height: 2px;
                        background: linear-gradient(90deg, 
                            transparent, 
                            rgba(100, 150, 255, 0.5) 20%, 
                            rgba(150, 100, 255, 0.5) 50%, 
                            rgba(100, 150, 255, 0.5) 80%, 
                            transparent
                        );
                        animation: borderFlow 4s ease-in-out infinite;
                    }

                    @keyframes borderFlow {
                        0%, 100% { opacity: 0.3; }
                        50% { opacity: 1; }
                    }

                    .profile-image-container {
                        margin-bottom: 30px;
                        position: relative;
                        display: inline-block;
                    }

                    @keyframes rotate {
                        from { transform: rotate(0deg); }
                        to { transform: rotate(360deg); }
                    }

                    .profile-image {
                        width: 180px;
                        height: 180px;
                        border-radius: 50%;
                        object-fit: cover;
                        border: 4px solid #1a1a1a;
                        box-shadow: 0 8px 32px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
                        position: relative;
                        z-index: 1;
                        transition: transform 0.3s ease;
                    }

                    .profile-image:hover {
                        transform: scale(1.05);
                    }

                    .hero-title {
                        font-size: 48px;
                        font-weight: 300;
                        margin-bottom: 15px;
                        letter-spacing: 2px;
                        color: #ffffff;
                        text-shadow: 0 0 20px rgba(100, 150, 255, 0.3);
                        position: relative;
                        z-index: 1;
                        animation: fadeInUp 0.8s ease-out;
                    }

                    @keyframes fadeInUp {
                        from {
                            opacity: 0;
                            transform: translateY(20px);
                        }
                        to {
                            opacity: 1;
                            transform: translateY(0);
                        }
                    }

                    .hero-subtitle {
                        font-size: 18px;
                        color: #999;
                        font-weight: 300;
                        margin-bottom: 30px;
                        position: relative;
                        z-index: 1;
                        animation: fadeInUp 0.8s ease-out 0.2s both;
                    }

                    .resume-btn {
                        display: inline-block;
                        padding: 14px 35px;
                        background: linear-gradient(135deg, #1a1a1a 0%, #252525 100%);
                        color: #fff;
                        border: 1px solid #444;
                        text-decoration: none;
                        font-size: 15px;
                        font-weight: 300;
                        cursor: pointer;
                        transition: all 0.3s ease;
                        position: relative;
                        z-index: 1;
                        overflow: hidden;
                        animation: fadeInUp 0.8s ease-out 0.4s both;
                    }

                    .resume-btn::before {
                        content: '';
                        position: absolute;
                        top: 50%;
                        left: 50%;
                        width: 0;
                        height: 0;
                        border-radius: 50%;
                        background: rgba(100, 150, 255, 0.1);
                        transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
                        transition: width 0.6s, height 0.6s;
                    }

                    .resume-btn:hover::before {
                        width: 300px;
                        height: 300px;
                    }

                    .resume-btn:hover {
                        border-color: rgba(100, 150, 255, 0.5);
                        transform: translateY(-2px);
                        box-shadow: 0 5px 15px rgba(100, 150, 255, 0.2);
                    }

                    .content-wrapper {
                        max-width: 1200px;
                        margin: 0 auto;
                        padding: 40px 20px;
                    }

                    .section {
                        margin-bottom: 60px;
                    }

                    .section-title {
                        font-size: 32px;
                        font-weight: 300;
                        margin-bottom: 25px;
                        color: #ffffff;
                        border-bottom: 1px solid #222;
                        padding-bottom: 15px;
                        display: flex;
                        align-items: center;
                        gap: 12px;
                        position: relative;
                    }

                    .section-icon {
                        display: none;
                    }

                    .about-description {
                        font-size: 16px;
                        line-height: 1.8;
                        color: #aaa;
                        font-weight: 300;
                        background: #121212;
                        padding: 30px;
                        border: 1px solid #222;
                        border-radius: 4px;
                        position: relative;
                        overflow: hidden;
                    }

                    .about-description::before {
                        content: '';
                        position: absolute;
                        top: 0;
                        left: -100%;
                        width: 100%;
                        height: 100%;
                        background: linear-gradient(90deg, 
                            transparent, 
                            rgba(100, 150, 255, 0.03), 
                            transparent
                        );
                        animation: slideRight 3s infinite;
                    }

                    @keyframes slideRight {
                        0% { left: -100%; }
                        100% { left: 100%; }
                    }

                    .languages-grid {
                        display: grid;
                        grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fill, minmax(150px, 1fr));
                        gap: 20px;
                        margin-top: 20px;
                    }

                    .language-card {
                        background: #121212;
                        border: 1px solid #222;
                        padding: 25px;
                        text-align: center;
                        transition: all 0.3s ease;
                        cursor: default;
                        position: relative;
                        overflow: hidden;
                    }

                    .language-card::before {
                        content: attr(data-code);
                        position: absolute;
                        top: 0;
                        left: 0;
                        right: 0;
                        bottom: 0;
                        font-family: 'Courier New', monospace;
                        font-size: 10px;
                        line-height: 1.4;
                        color: rgba(100, 150, 255, 0.08);
                        white-space: pre-wrap;
                        word-wrap: break-word;
                        padding: 10px;
                        overflow: hidden;
                        pointer-events: none;
                        transition: transform 0.3s ease;
                    }

                    .language-card:hover::before {
                        transform: translateY(-10px);
                    }

                    .language-card:hover {
                        background: #1a1a1a;
                        border-color: rgba(100, 150, 255, 0.3);
                        transform: translateY(-5px);
                        box-shadow: 0 8px 24px rgba(100, 150, 255, 0.1);
                    }

                    .language-icon {
                        font-size: 48px;
                        margin-bottom: 12px;
                        position: relative;
                        z-index: 1;
                        filter: grayscale(0.3);
                        transition: all 0.3s ease;
                    }

                    .language-card:hover .language-icon {
                        filter: grayscale(0);
                        transform: scale(1.1);
                    }

                    .language-name {
                        font-size: 16px;
                        color: #ccc;
                        font-weight: 300;
                        position: relative;
                        z-index: 1;
                    }

                    .language-level {
                        font-size: 13px;
                        color: #666;
                        margin-top: 8px;
                        font-weight: 300;
                        position: relative;
                        z-index: 1;
                    }

                    .projects-grid {
                        display: grid;
                        grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fill, minmax(350px, 1fr));
                        gap: 30px;
                        margin-top: 20px;
                    }

                    .project-card {
                        background: #121212;
                        border: 1px solid #222;
                        overflow: hidden;
                        transition: all 0.3s ease;
                        position: relative;
                    }

                    .project-card::before {
                        content: '';
                        position: absolute;
                        top: 0;
                        left: 0;
                        right: 0;
                        bottom: 0;
                        background-size: cover;
                        background-position: center;
                        opacity: 0;
                        transition: opacity 0.5s ease;
                        filter: blur(8px) brightness(0.3);
                        z-index: 0;
                    }

                    .project-card:hover::before {
                        opacity: 1;
                    }

                    .project-card:hover {
                        border-color: rgba(100, 150, 255, 0.3);
                        transform: translateY(-5px);
                        box-shadow: 0 12px 32px rgba(100, 150, 255, 0.15);
                    }

                    .project-media {
                        width: 100%;
                        height: 220px;
                        object-fit: cover;
                        background: #0a0a0a;
                        transition: transform 0.3s ease;
                        position: relative;
                        z-index: 1;
                    }

                    .project-card:hover .project-media {
                        transform: scale(1.05);
                    }

                    .project-content {
                        padding: 25px;
                        position: relative;
                        z-index: 1;
                        background: #121212;
                    }

                    .project-title {
                        font-size: 22px;
                        margin-bottom: 12px;
                        color: #ffffff;
                        font-weight: 300;
                    }

                    .project-description {
                        font-size: 14px;
                        color: #888;
                        line-height: 1.6;
                        margin-bottom: 15px;
                        font-weight: 300;
                    }

                    .project-tech {
                        display: flex;
                        flex-wrap: wrap;
                        gap: 8px;
                        margin-bottom: 15px;
                    }

                    .tech-tag {
                        background: #1a1a1a;
                        color: #aaa;
                        padding: 6px 12px;
                        font-size: 12px;
                        border: 1px solid #333;
                        font-weight: 300;
                    }

                    .project-skills {
                        font-size: 13px;
                        color: #666;
                        margin-bottom: 15px;
                        font-weight: 300;
                    }

                    .project-link {
                        display: inline-block;
                        color: #888;
                        text-decoration: none;
                        font-size: 14px;
                        border: 1px solid #333;
                        padding: 10px 20px;
                        transition: all 0.3s ease;
                        font-weight: 300;
                        margin-right: 10px;
                        margin-bottom: 10px;
                    }

                    .project-link:hover {
                        background: rgba(100, 150, 255, 0.1);
                        color: #ccc;
                        border-color: rgba(100, 150, 255, 0.3);
                    }

                    .contact-btn {
                        display: inline-block;
                        color: #888;
                        text-decoration: none;
                        font-size: 14px;
                        border: 1px solid #333;
                        padding: 10px 20px;
                        transition: all 0.3s ease;
                        font-weight: 300;
                        cursor: pointer;
                        background: transparent;
                        margin-bottom: 10px;
                    }

                    .contact-btn:hover {
                        background: rgba(150, 100, 255, 0.1);
                        color: #ccc;
                        border-color: rgba(150, 100, 255, 0.3);
                    }

                    /* Modal Styles */
                    .modal {
                        display: none;
                        position: fixed;
                        z-index: 1000;
                        left: 0;
                        top: 0;
                        width: 100%;
                        height: 100%;
                        background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
                        animation: fadeIn 0.3s ease;
                    }

                    @keyframes fadeIn {
                        from { opacity: 0; }
                        to { opacity: 1; }
                    }

                    .modal.active {
                        display: flex;
                        justify-content: center;
                        align-items: center;
                    }

                    .modal-content {
                        background: #1a1a1a;
                        border: 1px solid #333;
                        padding: 40px;
                        max-width: 500px;
                        width: 90%;
                        position: relative;
                        animation: slideUp 0.3s ease;
                    }

                    @keyframes slideUp {
                        from {
                            transform: translateY(50px);
                            opacity: 0;
                        }
                        to {
                            transform: translateY(0);
                            opacity: 1;
                        }
                    }

                    .modal-close {
                        position: absolute;
                        top: 15px;
                        right: 20px;
                        font-size: 28px;
                        font-weight: 300;
                        color: #666;
                        cursor: pointer;
                        transition: color 0.3s ease;
                        background: none;
                        border: none;
                        padding: 0;
                        line-height: 1;
                    }

                    .modal-close:hover {
                        color: #fff;
                    }

                    .modal-title {
                        font-size: 28px;
                        font-weight: 300;
                        margin-bottom: 25px;
                        color: #fff;
                        border-bottom: 1px solid #333;
                        padding-bottom: 15px;
                    }

                    .contact-info {
                        display: flex;
                        flex-direction: column;
                        gap: 20px;
                    }

                    .contact-item {
                        display: flex;
                        align-items: center;
                        gap: 15px;
                        padding: 15px;
                        background: #121212;
                        border: 1px solid #222;
                        transition: all 0.3s ease;
                    }

                    .contact-item:hover {
                        background: #1a1a1a;
                        border-color: rgba(100, 150, 255, 0.3);
                        transform: translateX(5px);
                    }

                    .contact-item-label {
                        font-size: 14px;
                        color: #666;
                        min-width: 80px;
                        font-weight: 300;
                    }

                    .contact-item-value {
                        font-size: 16px;
                        color: #ccc;
                        font-weight: 300;
                    }

                    .contact-item-value a {
                        color: #ccc;
                        text-decoration: none;
                        transition: color 0.3s ease;
                    }

                    .contact-item-value a:hover {
                        color: rgba(100, 150, 255, 0.8);
                    }

                    .loading {
                        text-align: center;
                        padding: 40px;
                        color: #666;
                        font-size: 16px;
                        font-weight: 300;
                    }

                    .error {
                        background: #1a0f0f;
                        color: #ff6666;
                        padding: 20px;
                        margin: 20px 0;
                        border: 1px solid #331a1a;
                        font-size: 14px;
                        font-weight: 300;
                    }

                    @media (max-width: 768px) {
                        .hero-title {
                            font-size: 32px;
                        }

                        .section-title {
                            font-size: 26px;
                        }

                        .languages-grid {
                            grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fill, minmax(120px, 1fr));
                            gap: 15px;
                        }

                        .projects-grid {
                            grid-template-columns: 1fr;
                        }

                        .content-wrapper {
                            padding: 30px 15px;
                        }
                    }
                </style>
            </head>

            <body>
                <div class="container">
                    <!-- Hero Section -->
                    <div class="hero-section">
                        <div class="profile-image-container">
                            <img id="profileImage" class="profile-image" src="" alt="Profile Picture">
                        </div>
                        <h1 class="hero-title" id="heroName">Loading...</h1>
                        <p class="hero-subtitle" id="heroRole">Developer & Creator</p>
                        <a href="#" class="resume-btn" id="resumeBtn">Download Resume</a>
                    </div>

                    <!-- Contact Modal -->
                    <div class="modal" id="contactModal">
                        <div class="modal-content">
                            <button class="modal-close" id="modalClose">×</button>
                            <h2 class="modal-title">Contact Information</h2>
                            <div class="contact-info" id="contactInfo">
                                <div class="loading">Loading contact information...</div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>

                    <!-- Content -->
                    <div class="content-wrapper">
                        <!-- About Section -->
                        <section class="section">
                            <h2 class="section-title">
                                <span class="section-icon"></span>
                                About Me
                            </h2>
                            <div class="about-description" id="aboutDescription">
                                <div class="loading">Loading description...</div>
                            </div>
                        </section>

                        <!-- Languages Section -->
                        <section class="section">
                            <h2 class="section-title">
                                <span class="section-icon"></span>
                                Skills & Languages
                            </h2>
                            <div class="languages-grid" id="languagesGrid">
                                <div class="loading">Loading languages...</div>
                            </div>
                        </section>

                        <!-- Projects Section -->
                        <section class="section">
                            <h2 class="section-title">
                                <span class="section-icon"></span>
                                My Projects
                            </h2>
                            <div class="projects-grid" id="projectsGrid">
                                <div class="loading">Loading projects...</div>
                            </div>
                        </section>
                    </div>
                </div>

                <script>
                    // Get the base URL from the parent window (just the origin, e.g., http://127.0.0.1:5501)
                    const baseURL = window.location.origin + '/';
                    
                    // Configuration - Update these paths based on your folder structure
                    const CONFIG = {
                        resumePath: baseURL + 'assets/files/portfolio-content/resume/resume.pdf',
                        profileImagePath: baseURL + 'assets/files/portfolio-content/photos/profile-photo.jpg',
                        aboutDataPath: baseURL + 'assets/files/portfolio-content/json/about.json',
                        languagesDataPath: baseURL + 'assets/files/portfolio-content/json/languages.json',
                        projectsDataPath: baseURL + 'assets/files/portfolio-content/json/projects.json'
                    };

                    // Code snippets for language backgrounds
                    const codeSnippets = {
                        'HTML/CSS/Javascript': '<div class="container">\\n  <h1>Hello World</h1>\\n  <p>Welcome</p>\\n</div>\\n.container {\\n  display: flex;\\n}\\nfunction init() {\\n  console.log("Hi");\\n}',
                        'TypeScript': 'interface User {\\n  name: string;\\n  id: number;\\n}\\nclass UserAccount {\\n  name: string;\\n  constructor(name: string) {\\n    this.name = name;\\n  }\\n}',
                        'Python': 'def hello_world():\\n    print("Hello, World!")\\n\\nclass User:\\n    def __init__(self, name):\\n        self.name = name\\n\\nfor i in range(10):\\n    print(i)',
                        'Java': 'public class Main {\\n  public static void main(String[] args) {\\n    System.out.println("Hello");\\n  }\\n}\\nclass User {\\n  private String name;\\n}',
                        'C#': 'using System;\\nnamespace HelloWorld {\\n  class Program {\\n    static void Main() {\\n      Console.WriteLine("Hello");\\n    }\\n  }\\n}',
                        'React': 'function App() {\\n  const [count, setCount] = useState(0);\\n  return (\\n    <div>\\n      <button onClick={() => setCount(count + 1)}>\\n        Count: {count}\\n      </button>\\n    </div>\\n  );\\n}',
                        'Vue': '<template>\\n  <div>\\n    <button @click="count++">\\n      Count: {{ count }}\\n    </button>\\n  </div>\\n</template>\\n<script>\\nexport default {\\n  data() {\\n    return { count: 0 }\\n  }\\n}\\n<' + '/script>',
                        'Node.js': 'const express = require(\'express\');\\nconst app = express();\\n\\napp.get(\'/\', (req, res) => {\\n  res.send(\'Hello World!\');\\n});\\n\\napp.listen(3000);',
                        'Git': 'git init\\ngit add .\\ngit commit -m "Initial commit"\\ngit push origin main\\ngit branch dev\\ngit checkout dev\\ngit merge main',
                        'Powershell': 'Get-ChildItem -Path C:\\\\\\nSet-Location -Path D:\\\\\\n$files = Get-Item *\\nForEach ($file in $files) {\\n  Write-Host $file.Name\\n}',
                        'Lua': 'function greet(name)\\n  print("Hello " .. name)\\nend\\n\\nlocal player = {\\n  name = "Player",\\n  health = 100\\n}\\n\\nfor i=1,10 do\\n  print(i)\\nend',
                        'default': '// Code\\nfunction example() {\\n  return true;\\n}\\n\\nconst data = {\\n  key: "value"\\n};\\n\\nfor (let i = 0; i < 10; i++) {\\n  console.log(i);\\n}'
                    };

                    // Initialize the app
                    document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
                        loadProfileImage();
                        loadAboutData();
                        loadLanguages();
                        loadProjects();
                        setupResumeButton();
                        setupModal();
                    });

                    // Load profile image
                    function loadProfileImage() {
                        const profileImg = document.getElementById('profileImage');
                        profileImg.src = CONFIG.profileImagePath;
                        profileImg.onerror = () => {
                            profileImg.style.display = 'none';
                        };
                    }

                    // Setup resume download button
                    function setupResumeButton() {
                        const resumeBtn = document.getElementById('resumeBtn');
                        resumeBtn.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
                            e.preventDefault();
                            window.open(CONFIG.resumePath, '_blank');
                        });
                    }

                    // Load about data
                    async function loadAboutData() {
                        try {
                            const response = await fetch(CONFIG.aboutDataPath);
                            if (!response.ok) throw new Error('Failed to load about data');
                            
                            const data = await response.json();
                            
                            // Update hero section
                            if (data.name) {
                                document.getElementById('heroName').textContent = data.name;
                            }
                            if (data.role) {
                                document.getElementById('heroRole').textContent = data.role;
                            }
                            
                            // Update about description
                            if (data.description) {
                                document.getElementById('aboutDescription').innerHTML = data.description;
                            }
                        } catch (error) {
                            console.error('Error loading about data:', error);
                            document.getElementById('aboutDescription').innerHTML = 
                                '<div class="error">Failed to load about information. Please check the data file.</div>';
                        }
                    }

                    // Load languages
                    async function loadLanguages() {
                        try {
                            const response = await fetch(CONFIG.languagesDataPath);
                            if (!response.ok) throw new Error('Failed to load languages data');
                            
                            const data = await response.json();
                            const languagesGrid = document.getElementById('languagesGrid');
                            
                            if (!data.languages || data.languages.length === 0) {
                                languagesGrid.innerHTML = '<div class="loading">No languages found.</div>';
                                return;
                            }
                            
                            languagesGrid.innerHTML = '';
                            
                            data.languages.forEach(lang => {
                                const card = document.createElement('div');
                                card.className = 'language-card';
                                
                                // Get code snippet for this language
                                const code = codeSnippets[lang.name] || codeSnippets['default'];
                                card.setAttribute('data-code', code);
                                
                                // Create icon element
                                const iconDiv = document.createElement('div');
                                iconDiv.className = 'language-icon';
                                
                                // Check if icon is an image path or text
                                const isImagePath = lang.icon && (lang.icon.startsWith('/') || lang.icon.startsWith('http'));
                                
                                if (isImagePath) {
                                    const img = document.createElement('img');
                                    img.src = baseURL + (lang.icon.startsWith('/') ? lang.icon.substring(1) : lang.icon);
                                    img.alt = lang.name;
                                    img.style.width = '48px';
                                    img.style.height = '48px';
                                    img.style.objectFit = 'contain';
                                    iconDiv.appendChild(img);
                                } else {
                                    iconDiv.textContent = lang.icon || 'üìù';
                                }
                                
                                // Create name element
                                const nameDiv = document.createElement('div');
                                nameDiv.className = 'language-name';
                                nameDiv.textContent = lang.name;
                                
                                // Create level element if exists
                                card.appendChild(iconDiv);
                                card.appendChild(nameDiv);
                                
                                if (lang.level) {
                                    const levelDiv = document.createElement('div');
                                    levelDiv.className = 'language-level';
                                    levelDiv.textContent = lang.level;
                                    card.appendChild(levelDiv);
                                }
                                
                                languagesGrid.appendChild(card);
                            });
                        } catch (error) {
                            console.error('Error loading languages:', error);
                            document.getElementById('languagesGrid').innerHTML = 
                                '<div class="error">Failed to load languages. Please check the data file.</div>';
                        }
                    }

                    // Load projects
                    async function loadProjects() {
                        try {
                            const response = await fetch(CONFIG.projectsDataPath);
                            if (!response.ok) throw new Error('Failed to load projects data');
                            
                            const data = await response.json();
                            const projectsGrid = document.getElementById('projectsGrid');
                            
                            if (!data.projects || data.projects.length === 0) {
                                projectsGrid.innerHTML = '<div class="loading">No projects found.</div>';
                                return;
                            }
                            
                            projectsGrid.innerHTML = '';
                            
                            data.projects.forEach(project => {
                                const card = document.createElement('div');
                                card.className = 'project-card';
                                
                                // Set background preview if URL exists
                                if (project.url) {
                                    const screenshotUrl = `https://api.screenshotmachine.com/?key=demo&url=${encodeURIComponent(project.url)}&dimension=1024x768`;
                                    card.style.setProperty('--preview-url', `url(${screenshotUrl})`);
                                    card.style.backgroundImage = `var(--preview-url)`;
                                    card.style.backgroundSize = 'cover';
                                    card.style.backgroundPosition = 'center';
                                }
                                
                                // Determine media type and create appropriate element
                                let mediaHTML = '';
                                if (project.media && project.media.length > 0) {
                                    const mediaItem = project.media[0]; // Use first media item
                                    const mediaPath = baseURL + `assets/files/portfolio-content/${mediaItem}`;
                                    
                                    if (mediaItem.endsWith('.mp4') || mediaItem.endsWith('.webm')) {
                                        mediaHTML = `<video class="project-media" autoplay loop muted playsinline>
                                            <source src="${mediaPath}" type="video/${mediaItem.split('.').pop()}">
                                        </video>`;
                                    } else if (mediaItem.endsWith('.gif') || mediaItem.endsWith('.jpg') || 
                                            mediaItem.endsWith('.jpeg') || mediaItem.endsWith('.png')) {
                                        mediaHTML = `<img class="project-media" src="${mediaPath}" alt="${project.title}">`;
                                    }
                                }
                                
                                // Build tech tags
                                let techTagsHTML = '';
                                if (project.languages && project.languages.length > 0) {
                                    techTagsHTML = project.languages.map(lang => 
                                        `<span class="tech-tag">${lang}</span>`
                                    ).join('');
                                }
                                
                                // Build skills learned
                                let skillsHTML = '';
                                if (project.skillsLearned && project.skillsLearned.length > 0) {
                                    skillsHTML = `<div class="project-skills">
                                        <strong>Skills:</strong> ${project.skillsLearned.join(', ')}
                                    </div>`;
                                }
                                
                                // Build buttons
                                let buttonsHTML = '';
                                if (project.url) {
                                    buttonsHTML += `<a href="${project.url}" class="project-link" target="_blank">View Project ‚Üí</a>`;
                                }
                                if (project.contact) {
                                    buttonsHTML += `<button class="contact-btn" onclick="openContactModal('${encodeURIComponent(JSON.stringify(project.contact))}', '${project.title}')">Contact</button>`;
                                }
                                
                                card.innerHTML = `
                                    ${mediaHTML}
                                    <div class="project-content">
                                        <h3 class="project-title">${project.title}</h3>
                                        <p class="project-description">${project.description}</p>
                                        ${techTagsHTML ? `<div class="project-tech">${techTagsHTML}</div>` : ''}
                                        ${skillsHTML}
                                        <div>${buttonsHTML}</div>
                                    </div>
                                `;
                                
                                projectsGrid.appendChild(card);
                            });
                        } catch (error) {
                            console.error('Error loading projects:', error);
                            document.getElementById('projectsGrid').innerHTML = 
                                '<div class="error">Failed to load projects. Please check the data file.</div>';
                        }
                    }

                    // Setup modal
                    function setupModal() {
                        const modal = document.getElementById('contactModal');
                        const closeBtn = document.getElementById('modalClose');
                        
                        closeBtn.addEventListener('click', () => {
                            modal.classList.remove('active');
                        });
                        
                        modal.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
                            if (e.target === modal) {
                                modal.classList.remove('active');
                            }
                        });
                        
                        // Load contact info
                        loadContactInfo();
                    }

                    // Open contact modal
                    function openContactModal(contactDataStr, projectTitle) {
                        const modal = document.getElementById('contactModal');
                        const modalTitle = modal.querySelector('.modal-title');
                        
                        // Update modal title to show project name
                        if (projectTitle) {
                            modalTitle.textContent = `Contact - ${projectTitle}`;
                        } else {
                            modalTitle.textContent = 'Contact Information';
                        }
                        
                        modal.classList.add('active');
                        
                        // If project-specific contact data is provided, use it
                        if (contactDataStr) {
                            try {
                                const contactData = JSON.parse(decodeURIComponent(contactDataStr));
                                displayContactInfo(contactData);
                            } catch (error) {
                                console.error('Error parsing contact data:', error);
                                loadContactInfo(); // Fallback to default contact info
                            }
                        } else {
                            loadContactInfo(); // Load default contact info
                        }
                    }

                    // Display contact information
                    function displayContactInfo(contactData) {
                        const contactInfo = document.getElementById('contactInfo');
                        
                        if (!contactData || Object.keys(contactData).length === 0) {
                            contactInfo.innerHTML = '<div class="loading">No contact information available.</div>';
                            return;
                        }
                        
                        contactInfo.innerHTML = '';
                        
                        // Display each contact field
                        Object.keys(contactData).forEach(key => {
                            const value = contactData[key];
                            const item = document.createElement('div');
                            item.className = 'contact-item';
                            
                            let displayValue = value;
                            
                            // Make emails and URLs clickable
                            if (key.toLowerCase() === 'email') {
                                displayValue = `<a href="mailto:${value}">${value}</a>`;
                            } else if (typeof value === 'string' && (value.startsWith('http://') || value.startsWith('https://'))) {
                                displayValue = `<a href="${value}" target="_blank">${value}</a>`;
                            }
                            
                            item.innerHTML = `
                                <div class="contact-item-label">${key.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + key.slice(1)}:</div>
                                <div class="contact-item-value">${displayValue}</div>
                            `;
                            
                            contactInfo.appendChild(item);
                        });
                    }

                    // Load contact information
                    async function loadContactInfo() {
                        try {
                            const response = await fetch(CONFIG.aboutDataPath);
                            if (!response.ok) throw new Error('Failed to load contact data');
                            
                            const data = await response.json();
                            
                            if (!data.contact) {
                                document.getElementById('contactInfo').innerHTML = '<div class="loading">No contact information available.</div>';
                                return;
                            }
                            
                            displayContactInfo(data.contact);
                        } catch (error) {
                            console.error('Error loading contact info:', error);
                            document.getElementById('contactInfo').innerHTML = 
                                '<div class="error">Failed to load contact information.</div>';
                        }
                    }
                </script>
            </body>
